title: US expected to propose barring Chinese software in autonomous vehicles
content: The Biden administration plans to issue a proposed rule that would bar Chinese software in vehicles in the United States with Level 3 automation and above, which would have the effect of also banning testing on U.S. roads of autonomous vehicles produced by Chinese companies.

title: Maruti Suzuki to launch first electric vehicle and promote diverse eco-friendly technologies in FY24

title: Ethanol maker TruAlt Bio plans to float INR 1,000 cr IPO
content: TruAlt Bioenergy, a Bengaluru-based ethanol manufacturer, planned a INR 1,000 crore initial public offering, filing the prospectus with SEBI soon. The IPO included fresh issuance and sale from existing shareholders. The company's revenues rose to INR 1,225 crore in FY24 from INR 768 crore in FY23. TruAlt Bioenergy began operations in October 2022 with distilleries in Karnataka.

title: Ola Electric’s Kripa Ananthan says circular economy needs to be implemented from the designing stage itself

title: Big truckmakers bet on hydrogen to extend combustion engine life
content: The global truck making industry faces a complex balancing act to get to zero emissions. Electric batteries are too heavy for long-haul freight operations and take long to charge. Using hydrogen fuel cells to generate electricity reduces the weight and extends the range of trucks, but switching to this technology is expensive as companies need to design new truck systems.

title: Sodium-ion batteries are set to spark a renewable energy revolution - and Australia must be ready
content: Energy storage collects excess energy generated by renewables, stores it then releases it on demand, to help ensure a reliable supply. Such facilities provide either short or long-term (more than 100 hours) storage. At present, lithium-ion batteries are the primary storage technology but are best for short-term storage. Sodium-ion batteries are now almost ready to fill the long-term storage gap.
